RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/mysql/crsp_audit_dbtablename.mysql
RuleSet.GenFile: -- -- @(#) $GenPackageDir$/$GenFileName$ $MssDoubleDashScriptLicense$ delimiter //// create procedure $lower DbSchemaName$.$sp_audit_dbtablename$($implMySqlSPStandardArgs$$switch HasClassCode yes implMySqlSPArgClassCode default empty$$implMySqlSPAuditPKeyArgs$, argAuditAction integer ) not deterministic modifies sql data begin$switch HasClassCode yes implMySqlSPAuditTableWithClassCode default implMySqlSPAuditTableNoClassCode$ end;////
RuleSet.GenRule: $reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implMySqlSPAuditPKeyArg )$

insert into $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$_h ($reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implMySqlSPAuditInheritedIntoPKeyColumn )$ auditclusterid, auditsessionid, auditstamp,$implMySqlSPAuditInheritedIntoDataColumnNameComma$ revision, auditaction ) select$reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implMySqlSPAuditInheritedPKeyColumnNameComma )$ argAuditClusterId, argAuditSessionId, now(),$implMySqlSPAuditInheritedDataColumnNameComma$ $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision, argAuditAction from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implMySqlSPAuditTableWhereAuditPKeyCol each implMySqlSPAuditTableWhereAndAuditPKeyCol )$;

case argClassCode when '$ClassCode$' then$implMySqlSPAuditTableClassCodeBody$$iterate TableSubClasses( each implMySqlSPAuditTableSubCode empty empty )$ else signal sqlstate '45004' set message_text = '$poptop Table sp_audit_dbtablename$() Unrecognized class code', schema_name = '$lower DbSchemaName$', table_name = '$poptop Table DbTableName$'; end case;
when '$ClassCode$' then$implMySqlSPAuditTableClassCodeBody$$iterate TableSubClasses( each implMySqlSPAuditTableSubCode empty empty )$

insert into $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$_h ($reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implMySqlSPAuditInheritedIntoPKeyColumn )$ classcode, auditclusterid, auditsessionid, auditstamp,$implMySqlSPAuditInheritedIntoDataColumnNameComma$ revision, auditaction ) select$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implMySqlSPAuditInheritedPKeyColumnNameComma )$ $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.classcode, argAuditClusterId, argAuditSessionId, now(),$implMySqlSPAuditInheritedDataColumnNameComma$ $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision, argAuditAction from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMySqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implMySqlSPAuditTableWhereAuditPKeyCol each implMySqlSPAuditTableWhereAndAuditPKeyCol )$;
$lower reference Index reference Table ClassCode$.$lower DbColumnName$ = arg$Name$
$lower reference Index reference Table ClassCode$.$lower DbColumnName$,
